Ingredients: sugar, cocoa butter, skimmed milk powder, milk fat,
cocoa mass, lactose, whey powder (from milk), wheat flour, cocoa powder,
emulsifier (soya lecithin), palm fat, sunflower oil, glucose syrup,
natural colour (E153), salt, raising agent (E503), natural vanilla extract.
(May contain: peanut, hazelnut, almond). Milk chocolate
contains milk solids 14% minimum and cocoa solids 25% minimum.
Suitable for Vegetarians.

minimum and cocoa solids 25% minimum
